description:
## Parent Task Context (Already Completed)

> **Note:** The following parent task has already been completed. This context is provided to help you understand the background and requirements for this sub-task. Do not re-implement the parent task - focus only on the new sub-task described below.

### Task (feature-)

**Description:** Build Advanced Discovery Analytics Dashboard - Create a comprehensive analytics page showing recommendation effectiveness metrics: acceptance rate by recommendation type (similar/discovery/mood/personalized), top recommended artists/genres, user engagement patterns, and A/B testing capabilities for different recommendation algorithms. be mindful of analytics already implemented

---

## Task Description

much better the top cards are displaying info in feedback,acceptance, discovery,monthyl but not in any of the four sections below it including a/b testing
title: Add analytics metrics display to recommendation sections
